comment.author: 66041448@N00
comment._content: This is a smudge painting (using the smudge brush in Paint Shop Pro and a Wacom tablet) of the Ashuelot River, Keene, NH, based on this image contributed to the Flickr Commons by the Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County. Welcome KPL and HSCC, and thank you for your inspiration! See a larger view of the smudge painting at: farm5.static.flickr.com/4019/4701684954_ccddb7b65e_o.jpg
